name: wl-rgen
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpgbir(s0, wl-ral(s0, c0, w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))

body.origin:
|- wl-ral(s0, c0, w0)
-| wb(wl-ral(s0, c0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wl-ral(s0, c0, w0)
-| wb(wl-ral(s0, c0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wl-ral(s0, c0, w0), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wl-ral(s0, c0, w0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Generalization rule for restricted quantification. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jun-2023.)
